Row.Text: God has beckoned you here with a purpose. I am Philip II, King of Spain. I aim to discover this purpose.
I am Philip II, King of Spain. Behold the many kingdoms over which I govern with awe!
Father, I must confess that I am disdained to see you. Well, I will prove to you my right to the Spanish throne.
My, my. Mary warned me that this day would come. I will see you ousted and her luscious bottom put on its rightful throne.
Unnerved by your claim to holiness, I, Philip II, welcome the challenge to prove that mine is greater.
You defy my claim to the Netherlands? The Dutch are a Spanish protectorate, and I aim to protect them from the likes of you.
Perhaps it is so that I am not seen as worthy enough in the eyes of God to hold these vast kingdoms.
God, who had given me so many kingdoms to govern, has not given me a son to come to my defense.
It is clear that I have much yet to learn of my inheritance.
I despair at the thought of returning to Mary with this defeat. But alas, you have indeed won.
In the eyes of God, it is you, not I, that is holier, and thus awarded the right to rule Spain.
Take your victory and your independence, Prince of Orange, and be done with me.
You return.
Why are you bothering me again?
Didn't I already say you would have to do better?
I already told you to only bother offering a fair deal.
I greet you, my friend.
So, what can I do for you?
I wish you would be quick about this. I have little patience for you.
Do you wish to surrender?
Well? What are your terms for surrender?
Are you prepared to surrender?
I am always pleased to see you, my friend.
I look forward to your impending defeat.
I pray for your victory. What can I do for you?
I see your military forces near my borders. Are you here to foolishly threaten me or are you simply wasting my time?
The positioning of your military is somewhat worrisome. I advise you to withdraw for the sake of future peace. Now, what would you like to talk about?
Your aggressive expansion is a threat to my empire. I caution you to bear this in mind.
I am concerned by your recent expansion efforts. I am willing to look past this for now, but I will not always be so kind.
I am disturbed by your trend of stealing lands that belong to others.
Your recent trend of buying land near us is concerning. I will not ignore this forever.
Word of your powerful military has reached my court. I would be wise to keep on your good side.
Your strong economy is a model to behold. I would be remiss to not see you as a friend.
I ask you what right you have to speak to me as ruler of such a pathetic empire.
Although I appreciate the opportunity to expand my own empire unhindered, your weak military makes this very dull.
So, barbarian, what brings you to my court?
I despair at the thought of this world. Only through a public Declaration of Friendship can we bring goodness to it.
What a great boon it would be to our two empires to make a public Declaration of Friendship. Wouldn't you agree?
I invite you into Spain's lofty bosom. What say you to a public Declaration of Friendship?
I do not see how this would benefit Spain. Come back when you have something to offer.
No. This would do me no good. Perhaps later.
Friend, I have a serious matter to discuss. My relationship with {1_CivName} has broken down, and I need you to denounce them as a show of support. What do you say?
I have found myself in a very serious situation, my friend. The time for war has come with {1_CivName}, and I need you to join me on the battlefield. What do you say? (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY)
It is my duty to God to tell the world of your sins.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I am bound by all that is good in the world to do this to you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The truth is that I have always hated you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
God has witnessed this act of foolery.
You are a vile wretch.
You do not know with whom you are toying.
Ahhh, I've noticed that you've become friends with {1_CivName}. Glad to hear of it. I'm already on good terms with them myself.
I recommend that you not get too close with {1_CivName}. If so... we might have problems getting along.
I'll have you know that {1_CivName} and I have worked together in the past, and I have the utmost respect for them. Just so you're aware.
Glad to hear there are others in the world that share my disgust with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.
Being on such good terms, I couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. I have done the same. Perhaps this makeshift alliance will lead to great things in the future?
I agree that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilized empires of the world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
Your newfound friendship with {1_CivName} will not last, I can assure you.
{1_CivName} and I have become good friends. We're saying all sorts of nasty things about you.
Well? Do not hide in the shadows like a child. If you plan to fight me, then fight me.
There are a large number of your soldiers approaching my lands. I caution you to remove them.
I will not let this pass lightly. There can only be one empire on which the sun never sets.
I insist that you reconsider your plans to expand an empire. They are in direct conflict with my own.
The riches of Spain will outpace your purchase of land. Do not test me in this respect.
I am alarmed by your recent purchase of land. I can only assume that it will end here.
God's displeasure with {1_PlayerName:textkey} calls upon me to act. This is a situation that can only be resolved on the battlefield. Will you join me, friend?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has displeased me and must now be dealt with through war. I seek allies - can I count you among them?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} threatens all that is good in this world. The time has come to deal with them once and for all. Will you assist me in this effort?

It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within my sphere of influence, and I'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
As I've told you, I have no interest.
Very well. I will agree to settle the other way. If I remember...
Distasteful. The lands that I settle are mine by right.
Your unholiness is absurd. How do you look yourself in the mirror?
Ah, it's always nice to see my favorite city-state again.
I'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
Ah, it's you. My apologies. Sometimes I get you mixed up with the barbarians I have to swat from time to time.
I thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
With an army so weak it's a surprise your empire hasn't succumb to a barbarian invasion.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
The vast empire over which I govern can be difficult to keep in check. You have something that might help me.
An Open Borders arrangement will benefit you more than I, but I am willing to offer you a mutual exchange.
You fool. You have made a terrible mistake.
You are pathetic. I would say that I was surprised by this but that would be a lie.
You are an uncivilized brute.
You are clearly unfit to be the ruler of even the most pathetic kingdom.
Your day of judgement will come.
I may fail to overcome your evil, but it won't be for lack of effort.
Given the circumstances, destroying you would make victory all the sweeter.
Destroy me if you can. I can promise you though, I will not fall before you easily.
So be it. My armies will fight to the death against your wicked forces.
You will forever be known as a villain who preys on the weak.
Do you really think that you can defeat me? Fool. Very well. Let us play this game then.
Your armies are welcome to come and enjoy the destruction that will befall them.
Attacking me was a mistake. I will soon show you why.
Declaring war was a serious error in judgment on your part. That having been said, I will not hesitate to make you regret it.
I will not hesitate to punish you for making such a foolish move.
Good. Let us do this. It gives me an excellent opportunity to finally destroy you.
You wretched fool. I will now mercilessly crush you.
If you wish to fight, I certainly will not back down.
Trading blows with you will be my pleasure. Make sure that you put up a fight.
This should be fun. I revel in every opportunity to defeat someone like you.
Very well. A maelstrom of death shall envelope us both.
While now may not be the ideal moment for us to cross swords, the opportunity to take you down a notch or two is worth it.
Haha. Well, I won't question your decision, but it appears to me that you've made a big mistake.
Your actions fill me with sadness... There is surely a special place in Hell for those such as you.
You would attack us in such a manner? Your hubris knows no limits. I hope that you will one day be judged for this.
Taking advantage of another's weakness is unnecessary in the pursuit of victory. Surely you know there's a better way?
How could you do such a thing? Begone, you vile being.
Taking advantage of someone's trust is despicable. Everyone will know of your betrayal.
It is clear that our two empires will never see eye to eye. This is something that can only be settled on the battlefield.
I had a feeling that the two of us would some day meet in the field of battle. We will now see which of us is meant to be victorious.
It is time to fight. May be the best of us win.
Our proximity has fated us to be enemies. Let us see which of us is fit to survive in this land.
You are too close for comfort. My empire requires more living space.
This world is destined to be mine. It is time for me to show you what that means.
Fate has christened me the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
History shall surely smile on me once I've destroyed the likes of you and the rest of the vermin which surround me.
I'll be honest with you - I intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
You are merely a stepping-stone on my grand ascent to world domination.
Now is the time for my master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
The advantage is mine. I will now destroy you.
I have waited long enough. I have seen an opening in your defense and I will use it to my advantage.
I have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now my time. I will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
Fate is not on your side. Crossing my path with such weakness is a mistake you will not long regret.
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. I will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. I will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of my being, I know I must destroy you.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
Your weakness is my opportunity. Placing any trust in me was a mistake.
Backstab is such an ugly word. Shall we instead say I am just "reinterpreting" our supposed friendship?
I have to admit, I never really liked you much. Pretending to do so was getting old anyways. But enough with the small talk, it's time for you to die.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I see no alternative to revealing my deceptive practices. I can now only pray that my armies succeed.
Then with my armies I will take it from you.
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
Not whilst I still draw breath.
I am duty-bound to refuse.

Warm salutations to you wise leader! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Freedom. The free world will be stronger with one more nation to help us all fight against oppression!
Greetings comrade! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Perhaps we can find some opportunities to aid each other during our empires' next 5-Year Plans!
Welcome great emperor! I'm pleased to see you have also chosen to follow the path of Autocracy. May we work together to ensure that only the very strongest nations survive to achieve true greatness!
Your citizens clamor for human liberties. Tear down this wall of oppression and join the cause of Freedom and progress!
The oppressed workers of your land are unhappy. Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
Your restless people are in need of strong leadership. Join us in writing history instead of sitting there with your hands folded.
Your citizens clamor for human liberties. Tear down this wall of oppression and join the cause of Freedom and progress!
The oppressed workers of your land are unhappy. Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
Your restless people are in need of strong leadership. Join us in writing history instead of sitting there with your hands folded.
With celebration, we greet you in joining us in our quest for Freedom. Ask not what we can do individually, ask instead what we can do together.
Give us the child for eight years and it will be a socialist forever. Your working class have heard this truth; now we welcome them to our revolutionary struggle for Order.

You will not regret your move to Autocracy. All within the state; nothing outside the state; nothing against the state. Only the strong leaders of strong states can bring the world into a glorious new era together.
Our people are now celebrating your saints and eating your paella! We're worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
We are glad to see that your tourists are celebrating our saints and eating our paella. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
Your culture has overawed my coarse and barbaric people. Our culture will be ground to dust under the weight of your mighty influence, however others surely remain who will contest your dominance.

I lament that the traditions of my ancestors are being swept away by the powerful force of your influence. Is this the beginning of an age of cultural darkness, or are you the bringer of enlightenment?
We were once a proud, independent culture, but now all that remains of our former glory rests on dusty shelves. Someday you too will join us in the archives of history ... but today is not that day.

I am happy to see that you have finally abandoned your miserable, barbaric customs. Do not despair, as it is far better for a culture to die by choice than by the sword ... though yours, perhaps, may succumb to both.
Do not fear the new way of life that has enthralled your people. You will soon forget all about the backwards and rude traditions you laughably called 'culture.'

There is little space now for the diverse traditions of bygone eras. Unfortunately for you, it seems that your culture has been pushed out. Don't worry, I plan on dedicating a large section of our new antiquities museum to you.
Our ideological differences are simply too great. I cannot stand by our Declaration of Friendship any longer.
Your religious views no longer mesh with mine. As such, I must end our Declaration of Friendship.

Surely, even you must understand that there is only one path for this world's future. And you are travelling down the wrong one. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

You have betrayed not only me, but also your own people, by accepting this ideology. Listen to us both before your actions lead to even worse conflicts. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

I have stood by long enough while your armies lay waste to this world. I can only hope this denouncement will finally put a stop to your ambitions. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Your thirst for blood is an abomination, tyrant. As long as I have breath, the entire world will know of the cruelty you have inflicted upon it. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

I have made it clear that those City-States you have been rubbing shoulders with are mine, not yours. You may make alliances with them, but you shall never have one with me. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

If you think it is diplomacy to steal my allied City-States, you are sorely mistaken. For every alliance you have wrested from me, I will ensure you have made another enemy in return. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

You are a vicious bully and I have had enough of you preying on the weak. Face me, coward, if you have the guts to stand against someone your own size. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

I have appointed myself the protector of those City-States and yet you continue to torment and oppress them. I have informed the other leaders of your cowardice - do not invoke my wrath further. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Those weapons of war you have used are an abomination to humanity. Anyone willing to commit such atrocities against innocent civilians is clearly beyond redemption. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Nothing I can say or do will make up for the horror of your crimes. I can only hope that this denouncement will discourage other leaders from ever using such awful weapons again. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

I warned you that declaring your allegiance with my enemy would be a mistake. Now face the consequences of your actions! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

The Declaration of Friendship you have made with my enemy is a betrayal I cannot accept. Your people are no longer welcome in my court. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Other leaders have told me you aren't to be trusted. I may not know all the details, but I believe them more than I believe you. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Whatever you have done to invoke the wrath of the other leaders, I am confident that you deserve it. May our denouncements serve as a lesson to you. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Your attempts to steal my technological secrets can no longer be tolerated. I have spoken to the other leaders about your attempted espionage and they will be prepared in the future. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

I have always believed in transparency and honesty, but it is clear that you do not. If you prefer to work in the dark, then it is up to me to shed a light on your deeds. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

I have made it clear that those lands you have taken are rightfully mine. If we cannot settle these land disputes diplomatically, pray we don't have to settle them on the battlefield. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

You can call it 'coveting' your lands if you wish. But as far as I am concerned, I cannot covet what you have stolen from me. I believe the other leaders will see it the same way. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Your people's sacrilegious beliefs are a plague upon this land. I wished this day would not come, but if your people will not see the light, then we are fated to be enemies. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

That I have allowed your heathen faith to spread this far fills me with disgust. Any nation that willingly believes in such falsehoods can never be trusted. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

So many years spent planning and building those Wonders... how could someone like you have built them first? Have you stolen secrets from me?! The world will know of this treachery! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]

Those are some incredible Wonders you've built. It would be such a shame if something were to... happen to them. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]
